main.name: Eamon O'Callaghan
main.description: I am a Full Stack Software Engineer who is passionate about problem solving. I have a strong foundation in JavaScript, HTML and CSS and have used TypeScript, React and Tailwind in recent projects. I recently co-created Alexandria, an interactive language learning app. I write about JavaScript over at Medium.
main.bio: I'm originally from Ireland, but after spending 7 years living in the south of Spain I've recently moved with my wife to Belgium. I speak English and Spanish fluently, and am currently working on improving my intermediate level French. I love probelm solving, challenging myself and learning new things. When I'm not coding, I'm usually out running or cycling, or exploring new places with my wife.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me here.

resume.skillmessage: Here is my level of comfort with each skill and technology below. I am very comforable with reading and learning from documention, so I can get up to scratch quickly.

education.description: A program that focuses on mastering the fundamentals of software engineering.

work.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
work.description: Co-designed the relational database, API, backend and frontend of Alexandria.

work.title: SPOT lead at Launch School
work.description: Lead sessions to help fellow students understand various aspects of JavaScript, object oriented programming, Prototypal inheritance, etc.

projects.title: Alexandria
projects.category: An interactive web app for learning languages through reading.
